entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
